item.title: Boat Club head off on a Tour de France
item.author: Jack Stuart,Lewis Rogers,
item.description: Annually, the Imperial College School of Medicine Raising and Giving team organise a trip to a European city for a night out; with this year’s destination being Paris. When this was announced, the ICSM Boat Club thought, why take the coach when you can cycle there for charity instead? It’s only …
